page.title: 07Education in Eccleshall
page.content:
100 children from three to five attend either private Nursery School or Play- group each week. State schooling for five to nine year-olds begins at the Lonsdale First School where a head- master and nine teachers are in charge of 222 children from Eccleshall and neighbouring villages. Eccleshall C of E Middle School employs a headmaster,
deputy headmaster and fifteen teachers for 277 children aged nine to thirteen from Eccleshall and eight outlying villages. Concern is at felt at present over the intended closure of the Middle School
